title: Gamma App — AI Tool Review
description: Gamma creates beautiful AI-powered presentations, documents, and websites from a simple prompt in seconds — no design skills required. Gamma is an AI-powered presentation and document creation tool that generates visually stunning slides, documents, and websites from a single prompt or outline. It handles layout, design, and content automatically. Unlike PowerPoint, Gamma creates web-native presentations that can be shared via link, embedded, or exported as PDF. Hugely popular for fast business and educational content creation. Highlights: Beautiful AI-generated designs. Web-native sharing (link-based). Presentations + docs + websites. Easy editing and customization. Free tier available.
